constant.title: Constant
constant.description: Push constant values to operand stack.

load.title: Load
load.description: Load operand stack value from local variable.

store.title: Store
store.description: Store operand stack value to local variable.

conversion.title: Conversion
conversion.description: Convert numeric types on operand stack.

conditional.title: Conditional
conditional.description: Conditional jumps depending on values on operand stack.

reserved.title: Reserved
reserved.description: Reserved opcodes for internal usage in VM implementations only.
